text:
Question 91) Public institutions make use of warnings as a communication instrument with the citizen. This warning, focused on passengers, has the purpose of
A) Request that the bags be presented for inspection.
B) Notify the passenger for the transport of prohibited products.
C) Inform that the suitcase was searched by the security officers.
D) Give instructions on how to get bags to avoid inspections.
E) apologize for the damage caused to the suitcase during the trip.
